name: Mythren
description:
Mythren is a social hybrid monster raising game. By raising a virtual pet, players are encouraged to learn about personal development and social growth through the journey of a character named Kaiya. Fight in fierce battles, talk to mysterious creatures, and help Kaiya become an official Mythren Trainer.

Requirements

Windows PC

Controller (Xbox, PS4, etc.)

Meant to run at 16:9 aspect ratios

Install Instructions

1. Download the zip file

2. Extract the zip file

3. Run the .exe

4. Enjoy the game!

Notes

1. "Versus" requires two controllers and is for 2 players!

2. If you manage to get stuck while walking around, there is an "Unstuck" Button in the pause menu on the Island!
